long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically Sync Twitter to Jike | 推特自动同步到即刻

When users want to post on both x.com and okjike.com simultaneously, there's no need to post twice on each platform. 

Users can simply write their post on x.com and click post.

The plugin will automatically sync the content to okjike. 

Currently, the plugin supports text and images. However, any videos included in the post will be omitted.

The plugin also supports selecting a related circle on okjike.
